reviews.author: Dana Huggett
reviews.review: I have been trying for days to get in touch with anyone in the office. Our hot water froze during the last cold snap and because of a design flaw the pipes ran in an exterior wall. The only solution was to put a small heater in the garage

ownerResponse.text: Dana, thank you for reaching out, and we apologize for the delayed response. A member of our team will reach out to you today to address these concerns.

reviews.author: Trevor M
reviews.review: Oh look, they made a new Google account to get rid of all their 1 star reviews! Perfect, I'll just copy and paste from my last 1 star review....

reviews.author: Callie L
reviews.review: Tried to steal our entire security deposit after move out when we spent 2 full days with 6 people cleaning the apartment. I anticipated they might try this so I took a video upon move out to prove the state of the apartment was perfectly

ownerResponse.text: Callie, thank you for your review. We apologize for the responsiveness issues you experienced. Although we do our best to fairly assess move-out conditions, we welcome former residents to reach out to us if they feel we have made a mistake  More

reviews.author: Salim
reviews.review: Ive been here for 2 months, and I have nothing good to say about PTLA. For starters, the entire apartment was much smaller than advertised on the floor plan. About 2 square feet per room smaller. The washing machines went out for a week,

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback, and we're sorry to hear that you have not had a good experience so far. Unfortunately, the laundry machines at your property are owned and managed by a third-party laundry company who will not allow us to do  More

reviews.author: Jayme Wilson
reviews.review: I have been trying to reach PTLA for a long time now regarding the status of a lease transfer application as well as documentation for ESA. Instead of responding to my emails/phone calls, they deny my upload of the documentation for ESA

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for your feedback, and we do apologize for the difficulty you had getting in touch with a member of our team. It sounds like we have now addressed your needs, but please let us know if you need any further assistance.

reviews.author: Lindsey Hanna
reviews.review: Awful customer service. Terrible response time for maintenance issues. basically cannot get anyone to respond to an email or phone call and if they do they usually mess it up. They have VERY sneaky wording in their lease renewals so watch

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your review, Lindsey. We are sorry to hear you haven't had a positive experience so far. A member of our team will reach out to you shortly to address your concerns.

reviews.author: Kari Na
reviews.review: I noticed the relatively recent bad reviews which got me a little nervous, however! My personal experience has been nothing but great so far! Jeremy Dauglash has gone above and beyond to take the time to answer all of my questions patiently

ownerResponse.text: Thank you for your feedback! We're so glad to hear that you had a great experience with our team. We hope you enjoy your new home!

reviews.author: Desirae Bradley
reviews.review: Update.our experience here has absolutely had the worst downfall since they fired the manager, Caitlin, who signed our lease. They went from 3 stars to 1.5 since parting ways with her. How funny. Well, we have many maintenance issues that

ownerResponse.text: We apologize for your experience and hope to improve it. A member of our team will reach out to you shortly to address your maintenance request and other concerns you may have at the property. We appreciate you letting us know your feedback.

reviews.author: Maya Williams
reviews.review: Do not rent from PTLA!!! They managed to remove all old reviews (pretty suspicious since most were 1-2 stars). I have had to deal with them at two separate properties and they have been difficult the entire time.

reviews.author: Matthew Schnell
reviews.review: 1. PTLA is difficult to contact. Plan to go directly to the office if you need to talk with anyone.  I had days where I called up to 6 times with no response or reply to voicemail or email. The property manager where I lived also rarely

reviews.author: Janine Richardson
reviews.review: Looking for a rental for myself. Unfortunately that company might be very busy. I've not heard back from them as of yet. There are admin fees. Pet fees. Sometimes y'all need to earn more than 3 times the rent. Goodness.

reviews.author: Justin Quyle
reviews.review: Dont rent from them if you can avoid it. There was hundreds of 1 star reviews, all of a sudden, theyre gone. Absolutely terrible and garbage property management office. I have no qualms with maintenance. They respond quick and do what

reviews.author: Corie Odenbreit
reviews.review: Pretty telling when all the reviews from before 2023 have been removed. They deleted my review from a year ago but thats ok Ill just keep posting one. Terrible place to rent from, Monterra Apartments are in a disgusting state and probably

reviews.author: Joey Saxer
reviews.review: PTLA is AMAZING the landlords are great and understanding. I got my first place through them. Other property managements turned me down because of no rental history

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for your review! We're glad we could help you find a home. If there's anything else we can help with, just let us know!

reviews.author: Abigail Clark
reviews.review: Do not rent from PTLA!!!!! They are scammers. After we moved out from our unit (which we had thoroughly cleaned and repaired damages) they kept our deposit AND charged us nearly 600 dollars for damages. Horrible property management.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for your feedback. We would love the opportunity to discuss your move-out charges with you, and a member of our team will reach out to you shortly.

reviews.author: Terry B
reviews.review: Nearly impossible to get a hold of when you need to. The unit I was put into first smelled like the person renting it BATHED in w3ed, despite the lease clearly stating that ANY drug--and literally calling out this one!--is a violation of

reviews.author: Aidan Sweet
reviews.review: I don't know what was worse, the bathroom ceiling collapsing and raining down the neighbors bath water, the uncapped gas line that was seriously leaking, the black mold, or the water being off every other day.

ownerResponse.text:
Hi Aidan,
Thanks for your review. We apologize for the maintenance concerns you've experienced, and a member of our team will reach out to you shorty to address these further.

reviews.author: Oliver Bibb
reviews.review: This company bought the property I live in and took over it as of YESTERDAY and I'm already upset. They gave notice yesterday in the EVENING on a FRIDAY about a bunch of things changing, didn't answer 8+ voice calls or messages even though

reviews.author: marcus cuenca
reviews.review: Weird leasing, just started my year lease and a month in they ask me to renew or I won't be able to later.

reviews.author: Dag Urmensch
reviews.review: PTLA is a slick operation staffed by young know-nothings.  If they send you a rental increase notice of 50% or more, four or more months before your lease expires, and illegally present this increase as an offer that expires in a month,

reviews.author: Eliza Gronke
reviews.review: They somehow removed ALL the old reviews. Worst experience/company ever. I contacted them about the mold in my unit at forest hills multiple times and they did nothing, it ruined all of my furniture and they just didnt care. They never

reviews.author: Will Stevens
reviews.review: This company might as well be a shell corporation. They won't pickup your call or return your email. The fact they took over barley a month ago and can't even return calls is ridiculous. Be careful and document everything in your apartment. They will try to confuse you and blame you for damage.

reviews.author: Ben Kelly
reviews.review: I have had someone parked in the parking garage spot I PAY FOR for the past week where I live, I have contacted this company SEVERAL times and havent heard back from anyone. Cant even have the person towed without the property managements

reviews.author: Adrien Couzens
reviews.review: NEVER RENT FROM PTLA I have been trying to get an application for a new guarantor through for 2 months and they have stonewalled me every time I have contacted them and given me wrong information multiple times. I just need to add a new

reviews.author: Wise Wons
reviews.review: This place sucks so bad. I cannot even express how confusing and impersonal the whole experience has been. Not only that, the amount of fees they charge is ludicrous. They are seriously nickel and diming the hell out of their

reviews.author: Indaris Nerothan
reviews.review: Somehow, all of the reviews are gone. Thats really suspicious because the majority of the reviews were 1-2 stars - real bad reviews.

reviews.author: Em Sanders
reviews.review: Absolutely awful property management company. They kept trying to offer my wife and I cheap apartments in sketchy areas even though they had nicer expensive apartments elsewhere. We make $4k+ a month. Its probably because of the color of our skin, the fact that we dont speak English well, and we are lesbian. Glad we did not rent here.

reviews.author: Riley Dehmer
reviews.review: Do not rent from PTLA. The company is not transparent with you. They are hard to contact. They did not prepare the landlord at all for me moving in, and it made for a horrible experience. Moving out is going to be worse.

reviews.author: Miles Hoffman
reviews.review: Charged us late fees that were not being posted in our account so we had no idea that they were adding up, but still made us pay them. So many fees, dont trust them.

reviews.author: Kacey Lind
reviews.review: Julian Forester was extremely willing to help and quick with his responses! Had a great experience here and wanted to share my appreciation! Also extremely impressed with how clean the unit was kept.

reviews.author: Christian Whiteside
reviews.review: Every time I call with an issue, they are rude and try hard not to help or resolve the issue. I fell worse about my day every time I speak with someone. They will straight up hang up on you if they dont want to hear what you have to say

reviews.author: W Riches
reviews.review:
One star is too much. 
This company is the worst!
WARNiNG

reviews.author: Tucker White
reviews.review: Shut the water off to the entire building without any warning in the middle of the summer. Called the company and the lady that answered was rude and acted like it was my fault and I was bothering her. I hate this company.

reviews.author: Tania Chan
reviews.review: Luci Moise was very helpful with my son's move in.

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for your review! We're so glad our team was able to make the process a smooth one. Let us know if there is anything we can help with in the future!

reviews.author: Rich Kohr
reviews.review: Knowledgeable staff, ready to help. Pleasurable front desk help

reviews.author: Kalei Church
reviews.review: Took months to get urgent maintenance issues fixed.

reviews.author: davis kenny
reviews.review: Terrible maintenance crews. Slow response times. Just another awful huge corporation who owns everything and doesn't care about you

reviews.author: Jamie M
reviews.review: Stay far away from PTLA and every one of their properties.

reviews.author: Ross Campbell
reviews.review: Very helpful and friendly staff!

ownerResponse.text: Thanks for your feedback! We're glad our team was able to help you!

reviews.author: Peps Winchester
reviews.review: Im so disappointed I dont even know what to say
